body.name: Three Geese Set of 1 White Goose Feather Bed Pillows Queen Size- Soft 600 Thread Count 100% Cotton, Medium Firm,Soft Support Surround Fill Polyester,White Solid
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 38 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: BUY NOW!-Queen Size 20" x 28", Fill material is 60% goose feathers and 40% polyester with a fill weight of 30 oz, sealed using traditional Single Needle Stitch With Self Piping.Package includes 1 pillow
COTTON COVER-Finely sewn of a soft and smooth 600-thread-count cotton shell. down-proof and Oeko-Tex certified to be absolutely free of harmful chemicals.

THREE CHAMBER DESIGN-The pillow has an inner chamber filled with 60%goose feathers, providing support & volume. The two outside chambers are filled with high quality 40%polyester, making them particularly cuddly.

MEDIUM FIRM PILLOW- The medium support pillow cradles the natural curvature of the upper spine to create the perfect position for your head, neck, and shoulders.it is ideal for people who don't want to be propped up too high and is provide an even sleeping surface to help keep the body in a horizontal line.

VACUUM PACKAGING-our pillows are vacuum packed. Upon receipt.Please pat flat, fluff gently and make the down fully stretch; Then air it in the ventilation environment, allow several hours to recover their full loft.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Three Geese? We are the professional manufacturer of home textiles,We’ve been specializing in bedding products for 21 years.Our factory has passed the ISO9001:2000 quality management system certification and the authentication of BSCI. Down materials are certified by DOWN PASS，RDS and other supply chain tracking system.All our products conform to the OEKO-TEX 100 quality standard. We believe that " Fine Quality and Great Service".you’ll always get the best feather pillow that you can cherish for years to come.Three Geese is committed to delivering you a restful night’s sleep through quality bedding products.We are confident that you will love your Three Geese Products. Once delivered to your home, take the time to fully enjoy them for 30 days. In the unlikely event that you’re not satisfied with your pillow or duvet purchase, return it to us for a replacement. If we can’t help you find a product you love to replace it, we’ll refund you, no questions asked.

THREE GEESE -THREE CHANMBE PILLOW THREE CHANMBER DESIGN This 3-chamber goose feather polyester pillow was designed to provide optimum neck support without compromising comfort. It contains the luxurious soft lofting properties of Polyester fiber with the comfort support of goose feathers encased in a soft cotton fabric. It is available in Queen:20X26inches, King:20X36inches. VACUUM PACKAGING Our products are Vacuum packaged tightly during shipping. Upon receipt, remove this item from its packaging,Shake out your goose-feather pillow ,fluff gently, and allow several hours for self-recover. In addition, products sealed in plastic packaging sometimes has disagreeable scent because of concentrated natural fibers. A few hours of airing typically removes the odor. Kindly Reminder Sometimes, you may notice dark spots through the fabric on your pillow or comforter. They are dark (gray) clusters of down and are present, to some degree, in even the highest quality (unbleached) hand selected white goose down. Goose down or feather turns gray as the goose gets older (just like our hair). It occurs natural, and the fill is not inferior in any way. Care Introduction Wash on Gentle Cycle at 30 Degrees. Do Not Bleach. Gentle Tumble-Dry on Low Temperature. Do Not Iron.

100% COTTON The cotton fabrics are woven with fine natural cotton yarns. It is well breathable and moisture absorbing. High thread counts of weaving density and professional finishing process enable perfect down-proof function and tencile strength while still maintaining soft feel.

Inner Filling Goose Feather Elastic Support-A piece of natural curly.clastic down with good support,taking great care of your neck. Medium smooth 2-4cm goose feather for option.polyester fiber full of texture.brilliant fill powerFavorable support for your neckBreathable and Heathy

A GREAT DAY STARTS FROM HAVING A GREAT SLEEP! Outer:40%Polyester Fiber,Inner: 60%Goose Feather Blend in the Middle.100% Cotton for Comfort & Breath-abilityMedium Density - Great for Back & Side Sleepers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I want another set! These are amazing! Comfy, full of fluff and so far no pokers.I am very strongly considering buying another two and maybe 4 more. These feel much higher quality than the price. Great pillows.Give them a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t write many reviews, only when I purchased a product that is exceptional. We have purchased hotel grade pillows in the past, but the name brand that were we were use to purchasing was no longer available. Pillows of this quality were too expensive to buy from other manufacturers. It’s been several years since that I’ve not been able to find a pillow that is not only exceptional in quality, support and comfort but is an exceptional value. It is difficult to put all those words in the same sentence. I hope the “Three Geese” company will be around for many years to come and continue to offer their quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Firm-ish and full of down! Full sized pillows.
reviews.reviewText: These are a great pillow set! They are a little too firm for me but I like my feathers and down to basically fold in half. My husband loves them. They fluff nicely and keep a decent shape when sleeping so he is in heaven. He says they make our bed look high end. LOL. If you like down/feather pillows these are a great set at a value add price. They do need pillow cases that are slightly bigger than a standard or the type that zip shut. Otherwise a total score!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a reasonably priced down pillow for a long time tried a few from a well know department store and they turned to mush when you put you head down......This pillow is just perfect for my neck whether lying on my back or side it stays firm but not too firm I loved it so much I ordered a second one for back up as I only use the one pillow when I sleep and others for decor.......I very highly recommend this company and for the money you just can't loose......Thanks for making such a quality product for comfort at such a great price as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This will drive you nuts with the crunchiness of the pillow. I was originally happy with the size and height but once laid on it, it was not good for me and the sound drove me nuts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top quality purchased 6 so far!
reviews.reviewText: These are incredible, fluffy, and natural. My cat also seems to love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best feather pillows
reviews.reviewText: This brand makes the best feather pillows! They are so comfy and give enough support. I love these pillows and I will buy more things from them. The pillows don't smell, don't poke, and you can fluff the pillow to its normal size all the time. The pillow gets flat only after days of not fluffing. I really love this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After years and years trying to find actual geese feather pillows that are so comfortable and slept amazing!!!!! Let them sit out for 24 hours to fully fill but they are so worth the money!! You won’t be disappointed!!!

I like the soft pliability of a down pillow but I need a bit of support, so this is a perfect mix. I tried another highly rated similar pillow, but it was just a bit too soft.My goal was to find one that was similar to the Fairmont hotel chain and this did a good job and saved me quite a bit of money.
Muy buen producto! Ahora me levanto sin molestía en el cuello y he tenido un buen descanso.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 3, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Très surprise du confort des ces oreiller. J’ai pris gros format. Parfait pour dormir sur le dos et sur le coter. On a seulement à les tapoter pour qu’elle reprennent forme. L’enveloppe est épaisse et solide. Je les adore.
Me encantaron! Sin dudar las recomiendo, están muy ricas
